title: Charles Brown ~ One More For The Road
description:
If you want a cool, sexy jazz-blues album for late night sessions then you need look no further.

Charles was blessed with a tender, deep voice, not unlike Terry Callier.

I&#039;ve included scanned cover art & biography.


Charles is best remembered for his classic "Merry Christmas Baby" and had took over the early Nat King Cole band when Nat departed for a solo career.


There are shades of early Ray Charles meets Percy Mayfield on this recording.


Enjoy and thanks again for your support Pirates.
